text: aur tum[1] unhen samajhoge ki jaag rahe hain, jabaki ve soye hue hain aur ham unhen daayen tatha baayen paarshav par phiraate rahate hain aur unaka kutta gupha ke dvaar par apanee donon baahen phailaaye pada hai. yadi tum jhaankakar dekh lete, to peeth pherakar bhaag jaate aur unase bhayapoorn ho jaate
